exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros. split. - intros H. apply Const in H. destruct H as [f [H1 H2]]. destruct H1 as [H3 H4]. split. + apply Hseq_u; auto. + right. split. * apply const_u1_meet; auto. * exists (power q 2), u, u1. split; try auto. - intros [H1 [H2 H3]]. apply Const. exists (fun i : nat => c). split. + intros i Hi. reflexivity. + intros i Hi. apply H3.
